content_descriptors.notes: There are bikini girls and dances in our game. For some cultures this may be sensitive.

name: Kebabstar Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.3 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Bulgarian, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Finnish, Japanese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Polish, Hungarian, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Greek, Czech, Swedish, Azerbaijani, Estonian, Filipino, Lithuanian, Slovak, Slovenian
